author: Lee Catlin
text: Our locality of approximately 95,000 residents is in the early stages of planning its first target industry study and I am looking for some "best practice" examples of studies and also some insight on how much we might expect to have to pay a consultant to assist with this??  We are "newbies" to this process so any guidance would be very helpful!
title: Target Industry Study
